column2: Another country has begun a propaganda campaign to reduce their infamy, and we were chosen as a target!
$FROMCOUNTRY$ has invited their allies to participate in their partition. Should we join?
No! We will not partake in this!
$FROMCOUNTRY$ has heard our invitation about joining our partition effort, and would like to know if they may partake. Should we allow them to?
It appears that we were not the intended target of the $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ call. They have denied our request to participate in the partition.
